custom_margin_tablet=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-32px||19px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]BUSH HOTEL IN MULDERSDRIFT GAUTENG
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ header_font=”Noto Serif||||||||” header_text_color=”#222222″ header_font_size=”31px” header_line_height=”1.3em” text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

ACCOMMODATION

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#5f6060″ text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”-4px||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-12px||||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|tablet” custom_padding=”||0px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a desk. With a private bathroom fitted with a bath and free toiletries, rooms at the hotel also have pool view. Guest rooms at 26 Degree South Hotel are fitted with a seating area

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.24.2″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″ text_font_size=”19px”]

Children under the age of 6 are not allowed, and approval must be obtained if guests wish to bring a child younger than 6.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_image=”https://bushcampsite.co.za/wp-content/uploads/2021/01/26D-South-11-of-132-1.jpg” custom_padding=”|||” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider show_divider=”off” disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ custom_padding=”30%||30%||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ededed” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”600px” custom_padding=”||27px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

lUXURY ROOM

Creative and quirky luxury rooms that redefine African bush accommodation with a modern, bush-boho twist overlooking the bushveld, wildlife and pool.

Each room is fitted with a flat screen and limited DSTV channels and air-conditioning unit.

There is a Dolce Vista pod coffee espresso machine with a variety of pods, tea and milk.

There is free uncapped wireless internet throughout the Hotel
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://direct-book.com/properties/26degreessouthdirect?checkInDate=2021-01-26&checkOutDate=2021-01-27&locale=en&currency=ZAR&items%910%93%91adults%93=2&items%910%93%91children%93=0&items%910%93%91infants%93=0″ button_text=”BOOK ONLINE HERE” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_button=”on” button_text_color=”#E02B20″ global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row disabled_on=”off|off|on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”1px||0px|||” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ffffff” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ make_equal=”on” padding_top_bottom_link_1=”true” padding_top_bottom_link_2=”true” padding_left_right_link_2=”true” module_class=” et_pb_row_fullwidth” _builder_version=”4.16″ width=”100%” width_tablet=”100%” width_phone=”” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” max_width=”100%” max_width_tablet=”100%” max_width_phone=”” max_width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”0px||0px|” make_fullwidth=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ background_color=”#ededed” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%” global_colors_info=”{}” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ text_font=”Roboto|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#000000″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”Poppins|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”40px” header_line_height=”1.3em” max_width=”600px” custom_padding=”||27px||false|false” header_font_size_tablet=”” header_font_size_phone=”25px” header_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” global_colors_info=”{}”]

SUITE

Large and comfortable for a family of 4, with a double bed in the main bedroom and a sleeper couch in the lounge area that over look the sparkling pool and beautiful mountain side.

Each room is fitted with a flat screen TV and limited DSTV channels and air-conditioning unit. There is a Dolce Vita pod coffee espresso machine with a variety of pods, tea and milk, hair dryer and bathroom amenities.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://direct-book.com/properties/26degreessouthdirect?checkInDate=2021-01-26&checkOutDate=2021-01-27&locale=en&currency=ZAR&items%910%93%91adults%93=2&items%910%93%91children%93=0&items%910%93%91infants%93=0″
